hero.subtitle: Transform your iPhone into a smart camera that automatically centers and tracks you. Perfect for rock climbing, workouts, and solo content creation.
hero.developmentNote: Movtrak is currently under active development and will be available on the App Store soon. Stay tuned for updates!

highlight1.title: Free Yourself from Hardware Limits — Focus on Every Climb
highlight1.coreValue: The perfect blend of extreme lightweight usage and professional-grade tracking.
highlight1.description: Achieved entirely with just an iPhone, without any additional stabilizers or equipment.

highlight2.title: AI Smart Camera Movement — Automatically Capture Your Peak Moments
highlight2.description: Your iPhone intelligently follows and frames your movement — zero filming experience needed.

highlight3.title: Create Your Sports Moments at the Lowest Cost
highlight3.coreValue: A low-barrier, high-output community for sharing your performance.
highlight3.description: No extra hardware, subscriptions, or filming tools required — your iPhone is enough.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Launch Movtrak on your iOS device.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Position camera towards yourself or the activity.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Tap record - AI automatically detects and centers you.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Go ahead! The camera follows your movement.
howItWorks.step5Desc: Stop recording and export your perfectly framed video.
